trans-unit.source: Specifies access rights for specific key containers.
trans-unit.target: 为特定密钥容器指定访问权限。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: This permission is intended to enable users to easily manage key containers when either a small number of keys is involved, or access is to be granted to only some keys.
trans-unit.target: 此权限旨在使用户能够轻松地管理密钥容器，当涉及少量的密钥，则或访问权限是授予只有某些密钥。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters" /> object that contains the cryptographic service provider (CSP) parameters.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters" /> 对象，包含加密服务提供程序 (CSP) 参数。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry" /> class, using the specified cryptographic service provider (CSP) parameters and access permissions.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的加密服务提供程序 (CSP) 参数和访问权限初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows access rights to be assigned for specific key containers identified in a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters> object.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数允许分配为中标识的特定密钥容器的访问权限<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry.%23ctor%28System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters%2CSystem.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了利用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry.%23ctor%28System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters%2CSystem.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags%29>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The resulting entry would have unrestricted access.
trans-unit.target: 对结果项的访问将不受限制。

trans-unit.source: The name of the key container.
trans-unit.target: 密钥容器的名称。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry" /> class, using the specified key container name and access permissions.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的密钥容器名称和访问权限初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows you to specify access rights for specific key containers identified by name; use an asterisk ("*") to represent all the key containers.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数，可指定为 name; 由标识的特定密钥容器的访问权限使用星号 ("*") 来表示所需的所有密钥容器。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了利用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags%29>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The resulting entry would have unrestricted access.
trans-unit.target: 对结果项的访问将不受限制。

trans-unit.source: The name of the key store.
trans-unit.target: 密钥存储区的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the provider.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The type code for the provider.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序的类型代码。

trans-unit.source: See the <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry.ProviderType" /> property for values.
trans-unit.target: 请参见 <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry.ProviderType" /> 属性获取相关的值。

trans-unit.source: The name of the key container.
trans-unit.target: 密钥容器的名称。

trans-unit.source: The key specification.
trans-unit.target: 密钥规范。

trans-unit.source: See the <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry.KeySpec" /> property for values.
trans-unit.target: 请参见 <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry.KeySpec" /> 属性获取相关的值。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry" /> class with the specified property values.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的属性值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows access rights to be assigned for specific key containers.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数允许分配为特定密钥容器的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: A `keySpec` or `providerType` value of –1 represents all key specifications or provider types.
trans-unit.target: A`keySpec`或`providerType`值 – 1 表示所有密钥规范或提供程序类型。

trans-unit.source: A `keyStore`, `providerName`, or `keyContainerName` of "*" represents all key stores, providers, or key containers.
trans-unit.target: A `keyStore`， `providerName`，或`keyContainerName`的"*"表示所有密钥存储、 提供程序或密钥容器。

trans-unit.source: A `providerName` or `keyContainerName` that is `null` represents all providers or key containers.
trans-unit.target: A`providerName`或`keyContainerName`即`null`表示所有提供程序或密钥容器。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了利用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags%29>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The resulting entry would have unrestricted access.
trans-unit.target: 对结果项的访问将不受限制。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry" /> object to compare with the currentinstance.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前实例进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry" /> object is equal to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry" /> 对象是否等于当前实例。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry" /> 等于当前的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry" /> 对象，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry.Equals%2A> method compares the properties of the two <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry> objects to determine if they are equal.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry.Equals%2A>方法比较两个属性<xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry>对象以确定它们是否相等。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key container permissions.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置密钥容器权限。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags.NoFlags" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags.NoFlags" />。

trans-unit.source: Many of these flags are powerful and permit access to key containers that should only be granted to highly trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 许多这些标志非常强大，允许只应授予高度受信任的代码的密钥容器访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The most powerful of the flags are <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags.Create>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags.Delete>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags.Import>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags.Export>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags.Sign>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags.Decrypt>, and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags.AllFlags>.
trans-unit.target: 最强大的标志是<xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags.Create>， <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags.Delete>， <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags.Import>， <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags.Export>， <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags.Sign>， <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags.Decrypt>，和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionFlags.AllFlags>。

trans-unit.source: For specific threats posed by the use of these flags, see individual flag descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用这些标志所带来的特定威胁，请参阅各个标志的说明。

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for the current instance that is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 获取适合在哈希算法和类似哈希表的数据结构中使用的当前实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry" /> 对象的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry>, suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 用作哈希函数<xref:System.Security.Permissions.KeyContainerPermissionAccessEntry>，适合在哈希算法和数据结构，如哈希表中使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key container name.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置密钥容器名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the key container.
trans-unit.target: 密钥容器的名称。

trans-unit.source: Use a value of "*" to apply the access entry to all key containers within the specified provider name and provider type.
trans-unit.target: 使用值"*"将应用到指定的提供程序名称和提供程序类型中的所有密钥容器访问项。

trans-unit.source: The resulting entry would have unrestricted access.
trans-unit.target: 对结果项的访问将不受限制。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key specification.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置密钥规范。

trans-unit.source: One of the AT_ values defined in the Wincrypt.h header file.
trans-unit.target: Wincrypt.h 头文件中定义的 AT_ 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Valid values for this property are AT_KEYEXCHANGE (1) and AT_SIGNATURE (2).
trans-unit.target: 此属性的有效值为 AT_KEYEXCHANGE （1） 和 AT_SIGNATURE (2)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is –1, representing all possible values.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1，表示所有可能的值。

trans-unit.source: The resulting entry would have unrestricted access.
trans-unit.target: 对结果项的访问将不受限制。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the key store.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置密钥存储区的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the key store.
trans-unit.target: 密钥存储区的名称。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are "User", "Machine", or "*".
trans-unit.target: 有效值为"User"、"计算机"或"*"。

trans-unit.source: If `null` is specified, the value is set to "\*".
trans-unit.target: 如果`null`指定的值设置为"\*"。

trans-unit.source: The resulting entry would have unrestricted access.
trans-unit.target: 对结果项的访问将不受限制。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the provider name.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置提供程序名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the provider.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: An example of a provider name is "Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider".
trans-unit.target: 提供程序名称的一个示例是"Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider"。

trans-unit.source: If `null` is specified, the enhanced cryptographic provider name is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`null`指定了，使用增强加密提供程序名称。

trans-unit.source: The resulting entry would have unrestricted access.
trans-unit.target: 对结果项的访问将不受限制。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the provider type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置提供程序类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the PROV_ values defined in the Wincrypt.h header file.
trans-unit.target: Wincrypt.h 头文件中定义的 PROV_ 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default value is –1, representing all possible values.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1，表示所有可能的值。

trans-unit.source: The Wincrypt.h header file defines the following values:
trans-unit.target: Wincrypt.h 标头文件定义以下值：

trans-unit.source: \#define PROV_RSA_FULL 1
trans-unit.target: \#定义 PROV_RSA_FULL 1

trans-unit.source: \#define PROV_RSA_SIG 2
trans-unit.target: \#define PROV_RSA_SIG 2

trans-unit.source: \#define PROV_DSS 3
trans-unit.target: \#定义 PROV_DSS 3

trans-unit.source: \#define PROV_FORTEZZA 4
trans-unit.target: \#定义 PROV_FORTEZZA 4

trans-unit.source: \#define PROV_MS_EXCHANGE 5
trans-unit.target: \#定义 PROV_MS_EXCHANGE 5

trans-unit.source: \#define PROV_SSL 6
trans-unit.target: \#定义 PROV_SSL 6

trans-unit.source: \#define PROV_RSA_SCHANNEL 12
trans-unit.target: \#define PROV_RSA_SCHANNEL 12

trans-unit.source: \#define PROV_DSS_DH 13
trans-unit.target: \#定义 PROV_DSS_DH 13

trans-unit.source: \#define PROV_EC_ECDSA_SIG 14
trans-unit.target: \#define PROV_EC_ECDSA_SIG 14

trans-unit.source: \#define PROV_EC_ECNRA_SIG 15
trans-unit.target: \#定义 PROV_EC_ECNRA_SIG 15

trans-unit.source: \#define PROV_EC_ECDSA_FULL 16
trans-unit.target: \#定义 PROV_EC_ECDSA_FULL 16

trans-unit.source: \#define PROV_EC_ECNRA_FULL 17
trans-unit.target: \#定义 PROV_EC_ECNRA_FULL 17

trans-unit.source: \#define PROV_DH_SCHANNEL 18
trans-unit.target: \#定义 PROV_DH_SCHANNEL 18

trans-unit.source: \#define PROV_SPYRUS_LYNKS 20
trans-unit.target: \#定义 PROV_SPYRUS_LYNKS 20

trans-unit.source: \#define PROV_RNG 21
trans-unit.target: \#定义 PROV_RNG 21

trans-unit.source: \#define PROV_INTEL_SEC 22
trans-unit.target: \#定义 PROV_INTEL_SEC 22

trans-unit.source: \#define PROV_REPLACE_OWF 23
trans-unit.target: \#定义 PROV_REPLACE_OWF 23

trans-unit.source: \#define PROV_RSA_AES 24
trans-unit.target: \#定义 PROV_RSA_AES 24

trans-unit.source: The resulting entry would have unrestricted access.
trans-unit.target: 对结果项的访问将不受限制。
